# [Interview #87: TPOD Signing Report - Chris Mullins, Entry #1](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=87#1)

#### Chris Mullins

I asked RJ, at the Palo Alto signing, if Moghedien was raped by Shadar Haran in
*A Crown of Swords*
.

#### Robert Jordan

His reply was, "Yes. Amongst other things."
